name: Dear Elise
description:
The Louvenia, 1610

The New World awaits those with the courage and bravery to face the unknown. That is what Arielle Sauveterre had thought. Sponsored by her employer and mother figure, the wealthy Elise Claudine Beaumont, Arielle embarks on a voyage of discovery and adventure.

Accompanied by two men under Elise’s employment, Arielle seeks to uncover the secrets of both the untamed sea and the Americas. Which should be easy...

... if not for some of those secrets belonging to Elise herself.

---

Dear Elise is a horror visual novel set during the Exploration Age. Made for the SCREAM SEAS jam.

---

Credits
  • Art, story, programming - Red Lily
  • Music by Nicolas Gasparini (Myuu) and Kevin MacLeod
  • Additional SFX - Freesound.org
  • Stock photography from Freepik
  • Made with Ren'Py
